p: A recombinant version of RVFV strain 35/74, originally isolated from the liver of a sheep during a RVFV outbreak in 1974 in the Free State province of South Africa, was used in the present work as described [ 16]. The titre was determined on BHK-21 cells as 50% Tissue Culture Infective Dose (TCID 50) according to the Spearman-KÃ¤rber algorithm [ 16].
